title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Stay cozy and warm with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, the perfect addition to any home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This compact black beauty is designed with simplicity and safety in mind, making it a reliable companion for those chilly days and nights.

At just 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches high, and weighing a mere 2.6 pounds, this space heater fits perfectly in small spaces and is light enough to move from room to room with ease.

The KISSAIR Space Heater offers you the flexibility of choosing between a gentle 750W warmth and a more robust 1500W heat with a simple switch, ensuring you're just right, no matter the weather outside. Plus, the fan mode keeps the air circulating on those days when you just need a gentle breeze.

Your safety is our priority. That's why this heater is equipped with an overheat protection feature and tip-over protection that automatically shuts the heater off if it's tilted past 45 degrees. Rest easy knowing that this ETL-certified heater is designed to keep you safe.

Turn it on and feel the warmth in just 2 seconds, thanks to the efficient PTC ceramic heating element. And don't worry about disturbing sounds; the operation is whisper-quiet at below 45 dB.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is not just a heater; it's a little guardian, keeping you warm, safe, and comfortable. Bring one into your home today and enjoy the cozy embrace of reliable, efficient heat whenever you need it.

Stay cozy and warm with the touch of a button! Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed with your comfort and safety in mind. This little powerhouse is perfect for any room in your home, be it the living room, your cozy kitchen, or even your office space.

With its simple controls, you can easily switch between a gentle 750W warmth and a toasty 1500W heat - all without any confusing dials or switches. The KISSAIR heater understands that your peace and quiet are precious, which is why it operates below 45 dB - that's as soft as a whisper!

Safety is paramount, especially in a home with little ones or pets. Our heater comes equipped with an automatic shut-off feature if it tips over, and it's built to protect against overheating, so you can rest easy knowing your comfort doesn't compromise your safety.

This heater isn't just about warmth; it's about convenience too! Weighing in at only 2.6 pounds and with compact dimensions of 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall, it's portable enough to move wherever you need it. And despite its small size, it's mighty enough to heat up in just 2 seconds, ensuring you don't have to wait to feel comfortable.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, meaning it's been tested and meets high safety standards. It's also a breeze to use indoors, with a sleek black design that fits seamlessly into your home decor.

Warmth is just a moment away with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. Enjoy the comfort you deserve, without any hassle or worry.

Stay warm and cozy with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed with you in mind! This handy little heater is perfect for any room in your home, whether it's your cozy living area, a student's dorm room, a bustling office, or even in your kitchen while you cook up a storm.

With a simple black design that fits any decor, this space heater measures just 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall, and weighs a mere 2.6 pounds, making it a breeze to move from room to room. Even better, it's powered by electricity, so there's no need to deal with any complicated fuel.

But don't let its size fool you - the KISSAIR heater packs a punch with two power options. Choose 750W for a gentle warmth or ramp it up to 1500W when you need to banish that chill quickly. Plus, it has a fan mode to help circulate air when it's not quite cold enough for heat.

Safety is a priority, especially for our wise and wonderful elders. That's why this heater is built with overheat protection and will automatically shut off if tipped over at a 45-degree angle. And you won't have to strain to hear your favorite show or chat with loved ones; this heater operates quietly, staying below 45 dB.

What's more, it's equipped with a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element that gets things warm in just 2 seconds! So no more waiting around in the cold. And, for your peace of mind, it comes with an ETL certification, ensuring it meets high safety standards.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ideal for keeping your space just the way you like it, warm and inviting, without any fuss or hassle. So why not add a touch of comfort to your day with this delightful little heater?

Stay cozy and warm with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, a reliable and easy-to-use source of warmth designed with your comfort and safety in mind. The KISSAIR heater is perfect for keeping any room in your home, dorm, or office toasty without any complicated settings or overwhelming technology.

**Simple and Safe for Your Peace of Mind**
- **Dual Heat Settings**: Choose between a gentle 750W warmth or a more robust 1500W blast of heat with a simple switch – it's like having two heaters in one!
- **Quick Heat Up**: Feel the warmth in just 2 seconds, ensuring you don't have to wait to chase away the chill.
- **Safety First**: Equipped with overheat protection and an automatic shutoff if tipped over at a 45-degree angle, you can relax without worry.
- **Quiet Operation**: With a noise level below 45 dB, it's so quiet you'll hardly notice it's on, ensuring your conversations or TV shows aren't disturbed.

**Compact and Portable for Your Convenience**
- **Lightweight Design**: Weighing just 2.6 pounds, and with dimensions of 7.72 x 6.38 x 9.13 inches, it's easy to move from room to room, wherever you need extra warmth.
- **No Complex Controls**: The intuitive thermostat allows for easy temperature adjustments without any fuss – perfect for those who prefer straightforward appliances.
- **Adaptable**: Not only for heating, but the KISSAIR heater also includes a fan mode to help circulate air, making it useful year-round.

**Trustworthy and Reliable**
- **ETL Certified**: Rest assured, your heater meets high safety and performance standards.
- **PTC Heating Element**: Durable and efficient, providing quick and consistent heat.

Ideal for spaces up to 200 square feet, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is the perfect addition to any room that needs a touch of warmth. Its sleek black design will fit in with any decor, and its simplicity makes it a joy to use, especially for those who appreciate ease and efficiency. Keep warm and comfortable without the complexity—choose the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater for your home today.

Stay cozy and warm with the simple touch of a button! Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater – perfect for keeping your favorite spaces like your home, dorm, office, or kitchen snug and comfortable.

This user-friendly heater is designed with your needs and safety in mind. It offers two heat settings: a gentle 750W for a lighter touch of warmth and a robust 1500W for those chillier days, ensuring you're just right, no matter the weather. Plus, with its efficient fan mode, you can enjoy improved air circulation without added heat.

Worried about safety? The KISSAIR heater comes with built-in overheat protection that automatically turns the heater off if it gets too hot. Additionally, it features tip-over protection that shuts the heater off if it's knocked over at a 45-degree angle, giving you peace of mind.

Compact and portable, this heater measures just 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall, and weighs a mere 2.6 pounds. It's easy to move from room to room, so the warmth follows you wherever you go. 

With the PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) ceramic heating element, you can expect to feel the heat in no time – it starts warming your space in just 2 seconds! And don't worry about any noisy distractions; this heater operates below 45 dB, making it as quiet as a library.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, ensuring it meets high safety and performance standards. Its intuitive controls and built-in thermostat make it a breeze to use – no complicated buttons or settings!

Enjoy the simplicity and comfort of the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, and make your personal space warm and inviting without any fuss. It's the perfect companion for anyone who appreciates a warm, cozy corner to relax in.

Warm up your space with ease and safety using the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Perfect for any home, dorm, office, or kitchen, this sleek black heater is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind, making it an ideal choice for our respected elderly customers who appreciate straightforward and reliable products.

Key Features of the KISSAIR Space Heater:

- **Two Heating Options**: Choose between a gentle warmth at 750W or a more robust heat at 1500W to keep your space just right.
- **Instant Comfort**: With a rapid heating time of just 2 seconds, you won't have to wait to feel cozy.
- **Quiet Operation**: The heater operates below 45 dB, ensuring a quiet and peaceful environment.
- **Safety First**: Equipped with both overheat protection and a tip-over protection feature that automatically turns the heater off if tipped over at a 45-degree angle, you can relax without concern.
- **Easy to Move**: At just 2.6 pounds and with a compact design (7.72"W x 6.38"D x 9.13"H), it's easy to carry and place wherever you need it most.
- **Fan Mode**: Not just for heat, the fan mode circulates air to keep your room comfortable in any season.
- **User-Friendly**: With intuitive controls and a built-in thermostat, adjusting the temperature is a breeze.
- **ETL Certified**: Rest assured, this heater meets rigorous safety and reliability standards.

Whether you are looking to warm up a chilly kitchen or keep your toes toasty in the living room, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat is a dependable companion for staying comfortable all year round. Enjoy the warmth without the worry!
